data.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - New Finisher Animations
data.detailed_description: Slay your foes in new brutal and spectacular ways with this visceral and adrenaline-pumping DLC!
data.about_the_game: Slay your foes in new brutal and spectacular ways with this visceral and adrenaline-pumping DLC!
data.short_description: Slay your foes in new brutal and spectacular ways with this visceral and adrenaline-pumping DLC!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
